nodes.documentation: @notice Allows the admin contract to add a user as any user role.
nodes.name: addUser

nodes.documentation: @notice Allows the admin contract to remove a user.
nodes.name: removeUser

nodes.documentation: @notice Allows the admin contract to update the role of the user.
nodes.name: updateUser

nodes.documentation:
@notice Allows the admin of the admin contract to kill the eco-system.
        This will send all remaining collateral in the vault to the
        admin as well as burning all the tokens. This function will kill
        the vault and the registry.
nodes.name: kill
